title: 75 US Lawmakers Now Support CBDC Anti-Surveillance Bill
description: Congressman Tom Emmer’s CBDC Anti-Surveillance State Act now has 75 cosponsors. “A central bank digital currency is government-controlled programmable money that, if not designed to emulate cash, could give the federal government the ability to surveil and restrict Americans’ transactions,” the lawmaker cautioned. CBDC Anti-Surveillance Bill Gains Support in Congress Seventy-five U.S. lawmakers now support […]

title: Binance’s 2023 report highlights heavy investment in compliance and security
description: Binance, one of the leading cryptocurrency exchanges in the world, has recently released its annual review for 2023, highlighting the challenges and successes it experienced throughout the year.  With 170 million registered users and 40 million new users, Binance has demonstrated significant growth despite a tumultuous year in the crypto industry. title: ChatGPT Revolutionizes Business Operations
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of modern business, one technology stands out as a game-changer: ChatGPT. Developed by OpenAI, ChatGPT represents a significant leap in artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities, particularly in natural language processing. With its versatile language understanding and generation capabilities, ChatGPT has quickly become an indispensable tool for businesses seeking to streamline their operations […]
